Query.Sentence: SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.ORDERS AS O INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.ORD_LINES AS OL ON O.ORD_ID = OL.ORD_ID INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.PRODUCTS AS P ON OL.PRO_ID = P.PRO_ID #WHERE# #ORDER#

WITH total_price AS ( SELECT ORD_DATE::DATE AS ORD_DATE,PRO_SELLER_ID, SUM(OL_PRICE * OL_UNITS) AS AMOUNT_PRICE, COUNT(OL.ORD_ID) as ORD_COUNT FROM ${mainschema}.ORDERS AS O JOIN ${mainschema}.ORD_LINES AS OL ON O.ORD_ID = OL.ORD_ID JOIN ${mainschema}.PRODUCTS AS P ON OL.PRO_ID = P.PRO_ID JOIN ${mainschema}.USR_USER AS UU ON UU.USR_ID = P.PRO_SELLER_ID GROUP BY ORD_DATE::DATE, PRO_SELLER_ID ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM total_price #WHERE# ORDER BY ORD_DATE

WITH ORDERSGROUP AS ( SELECT O.*, P.PRO_SELLER_ID, SUM(OL.OL_PRICE * OL.OL_UNITS) AS TOTAL_PRICE, SUM(OL.OL_UNITS) AS NUM_UNITS, COUNT(OL.PRO_ID) AS NUM_PRODUCTS, BOOL_AND(OL.OL_SENT) AS ALL_SENT FROM ORDERS AS O INNER JOIN ORD_LINES AS OL ON O.ORD_ID = OL.ORD_ID INNER JOIN PRODUCTS AS P ON OL.PRO_ID = P.PRO_ID GROUP BY O.ORD_ID, P.PRO_SELLER_ID ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ORDERSGROUP #WHERE#;
WITH ODERLISTUSER AS ( SELECT O.*, BOOL_AND(OL.OL_SENT) AS SENT FROM ORDERS AS O INNER JOIN ORD_LINES AS OL ON O.ORD_ID = OL.ORD_ID GROUP BY O.ORD_ID ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ODERLISTUSER #WHERE#;

WITH ORDER_PRICE AS ( SELECT ORD_ID, SUM(OL_PRICE * OL_UNITS) AS OP_TOTAL, COUNT(OL_ID) AS OP_NUMERO_PRODUCTOS, SUM(OL_UNITS) AS OP_NUMERO_UNIDADES, BOOL_AND(OL_SENT) AS OP_ALL_SENT FROM ${mainschema}.ORD_LINES GROUP BY ORD_ID ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.ORDERS AS O INNER JOIN ORDER_PRICE AS OP ON OP.ORD_ID = O.ORD_ID #WHERE# #ORDER#
